org.xlbean.definition

Class TableDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xlbean.definition.Definition
      • org.xlbean.definition.TableDefinition

  • public class TableDefinition
extends Definition
    Definition for table.

    To represent a structure of table, which is a set of pre-defined columns and any number of rows, this class has a attributes property as a Map of SingleDefinitions. For a column, name of the column and column number is set to SingleDefinition object and set to attributes. For rows, only the start row number is set to SingleDefinition object and set to attributes.

    • Method Detail

      • isDirectionDown

        public boolean isDirectionDown()
        Returns true if the direction of the table is down.

        It returns false, which means direction is "down", when this definition meets either of the following conditions.

        • Has a option which name is "direction" and value is "right"
        • "~" cell is defined at the top row.
        Returns:

      • getAttributes

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,SingleDefinition> getAttributes()
        Returns attributes which is a map to hold all the columns and start cell information.

      • merge

        public void merge(Definition newDefinition)
        Merges given TableDefinition instance with this instance.

        It iterates for all the attributes and merges them. If name of the given instance and this instance is not the same, it writes out warn level log.

        Specified by:
        merge in class Definition
        Parameters:
